records.location_details: Four migrants crossed illegally the border from Belarus to Lithuania by jumping over a border line fence. They were apprehended by Lithuanian border guards and redirected to Belarus.

possible_violations.violation_name: Prohibition of inhuman and degrading treatment
possible_violations.legal_basis: art. 3 of the European Convention on Human Rights
Article 4 of Protocol 4 to the European Convention on Human Rights
art. 18 of the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights
art. 19 (2) of the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights

records.context_note: On 20 March 2022, four migrants crossed illegally from Belarus to Lithuania, were apprehended by Lithuanian border guards, and subsequently returned to Belarus under Decision No. 42 of 2 August 2021. Frontex was requested for support but the migrants were arrested by another team.
records.evidence_quote: On 20 March 2022, four migrants who crossed illegally the border from Belarus to Lithuania were apprehended and returned to Belarus in application of Decision No. 42 of 2 August 2021
